data.description: The nozzle is placed into a wound and is filled with a single-use charge of expanding antiseptic foam that removes [[/roll 2D5]] Fatigue and remove all side-effects of one chosen Location of its Special Damage, not including broken and destroyed body parts. BioFoam also heals [[/roll 3D5]] Wounds, but removes their ability to naturally heal any Wounds or recover Fatigue until they receive an Extended Medical Test. Each time a Biofoam Canister is used after the first, it heals one less 1D5 for Fatigue and Wounds.
